plant.question: I have a big brown body, leaves and I give you tasty apples. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall
🍎 You can pick fruit from me
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am short and soft
⚽ You can play on me
🐄 Some animals eat me

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I am pretty to look at
🐝 I need bees to help make seeds sometimes
🌷 I grow in gardens and fields

plant.question: I grow in water, and have pads that float. Frogs like to sit on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I live in ponds and lakes
🌕 My pads are wide and flat
🌿 Some of my flowers are very pretty

plant.question: I am long and green, and you can eat me as a snack. Sometimes I'm in a pickle jar! What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am a vegetable
🥗 I am often eaten raw
🥪 You can slice me and put me in a sandwich

plant.question: I have a hard trunk, branches, and I lose my leaves in the winter. What am I called?

hints.text: 🍂 I sleep during winter
🐿️ Squirrels build nests on me
🪵 People use me to build houses and make paper

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp needles and cones. People decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long
🎁 I smell like winter
💡 People hang ornaments on me

plant.question: I am a plant that grows underground. Rabbits and people like to eat me. I am often orange. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable
🐇 Bugs bunny loves me!
👓 People say eating me helps you see better

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I store water inside me, so I can survive without much rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have spikes to protect myself
🏜️ I like hot and dry weather
🐪 Camels also live where I do

plant.question: I am a very tall tree. My wood is used to make pencils. What kind of tree am I?

hints.text: ✏️ You might use me at school
🇨🇦 I am a very common tree in Canada
🍁 I often grow very straight and tall

bug.question: I have six legs and I love to march. I carry food back to my home. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and strong.
🧺 I work together with my friends.
🍪 I like crumbs!

bug.question: I am a colorful bug that starts as a caterpillar. I can fly in the air. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I have beautiful wings.
🌸 I like to land on flowers.
🐛 I used to crawl before I flew.

bug.question: I make honey and live in a hive. I have a stinger, so be careful. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow and black.
🍯 I make something sweet that you can eat.
🐝 I buzz around flowers.

bug.question: I am red with black spots, and bring good luck! What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 People think I am lucky.
🔴 I am a bright color.
⚫ I have small dots on my back.

bug.question: I jump very high and I like to eat plants. I make a chirping noise. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I love to eat green things.
🟢 I am usually green in color.
🎶 I make a sound in the summer.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web to catch my food. I have eight legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I build a home out of silk.
🕷️ I am sometimes scary, but I help catch other bugs.
🦵 I have more legs than you!

bug.question: I fly around at night and am attracted to lights. Some people think I look like a fairy. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I come out when it is dark.
💡 I love bright things.
✨ I can be confused with butterflies

bug.question: I live underground in a colony. I can build huge hills. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I have many friends and family in my home.
🌎 My home is made of dirt.
🐜 I am small but mighty.

bug.question: I am a long, skinny bug that likes to eat wood. I can cause damage to houses. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I love to munch on wood.
🏘️ I can cause problems in buildings.
🐜 I look like an ant but I'm not.

bug.question: I can light up the night with my bright, blinking bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I glow in the dark.
🔦 My light helps me find a friend.
🌳 You find me in the woods
